feature1.explanation: Both texts use similar punctuation styles with the use of parentheses, slashes, hyphens, brackets, and commas.

feature2.explanation: Both texts exhibit similar lexical and grammatical features with a focus on technical terms related to the topic of discussion.

feature3.explanation: Both texts display comparable sentence structures and quantitative features with a mix of complex and simple sentences.

feature4.explanation: Both texts share a similar tone and mood, discussing scientific topics in an informative manner.

feature5.explanation: Both texts are free of spelling and typographical errors.

overall.explanation: Considering the similarities in punctuation style, lexical and grammatical features, sentence structures, text and discourse features, as well as the absence of spelling errors, the likelihood of the two texts being written by the same author is moderate to high.
